entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
